026package com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.windows;
027
028import java.math.BigDecimal;
029import java.math.MathContext;
030
031import com.ibm.streams.operator.Attribute;
032import com.ibm.streams.operator.OutputTuple;
033import com.ibm.streams.operator.StreamingData;
034import com.ibm.streams.operator.StreamingOutput;
035import com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple;
036import com.ibm.streams.operator.window.StatefulWindowListener;
037import com.ibm.streams.operator.window.StreamWindow;
038import com.ibm.streams.operator.window.StreamWindowEvent;
039
040/**
041 * Sample window listener to demonstrate window aggregation on a decimal attribute.
042 * This class incrementally maintains the number of tuples in the window
043 * and the sum of a decimal attribute in the AggregateInfo class. As tuples
044 * are inserted their attribute's values are added to the sum and subtracted
045 * from the sum as they are evicted.
046 * <BR>
047 * Through the facilities of StatefulWindowListener this class supports
048 * partitioned and non-partitioned windows. An AggregateInfo is maintained
049 * for each partition.
050 * <BR>
051 * Sliding and tumbling windows are supported. The trigger for a sliding
052 * window or the eviction for a tumbling window results in a output tuple
053 * being delivered to the specified output port. The attributes <code>sum</code>
054 * and <code>count</code> will be set to the sum and count values respectively.
055 * Each output tuple will be followed by a
056 * {@link com.ibm.streams.operator.StreamingData.Punctuation#WINDOW_MARKER WINDOW_MARKER} punctuation mark.
057 * The class supports all window definitions.
058 */
059public class DecimalSumAggregatorListener extends
060        StatefulWindowListener<DecimalSumAggregatorListener.AggregateInfo, Tuple> {
061
062    /**
063     * Attribute being aggregated.
064     */
065    protected final String attributeName;
066
067    /**
068     * Math context used for arithmetic. Set from the context of the attribute
069     * being aggregated.
070     */
071    protected final MathContext mc;
072    
073    /**
074     * Output port tuples containing the aggregate values are delivered to.
075     */
076    protected final StreamingOutput<OutputTuple> outputPort;
077    
078    /**
079     * 
080     * @param window
081     * @param attributeName
082     * @param outputPort
083     */
084
085    public DecimalSumAggregatorListener(StreamWindow<Tuple> window,
086            String attributeName,
087            StreamingOutput<OutputTuple> outputPort) {
088        super(window);
089
090        this.attributeName = attributeName;
091        this.outputPort = outputPort;
092
093        Attribute attr = window.getInputPort().getStreamSchema().getAttribute(
094                attributeName);
095
096        mc = attr.getType().getMetaType().getMathContext();
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Class for the per-partition state for the aggregate.
101     *
102     */
103    public static class AggregateInfo {
104        /**
105         * Sum of the attribute's value for tuples in the window.
106         */
107        public BigDecimal sum = BigDecimal.ZERO;
108        
109        /**
110         * Number of tuples in the window.
111         */
112        public int count;
113    }
114
115    /**
116     * Create a new AggregateInfo as the initial state.
117     */
118    @Override
119    protected AggregateInfo getInitializedState(Object partition,
120            AggregateInfo state) {
121        return new AggregateInfo();
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * Perform window based aggregation with incremental state updates.
126     */
127    @Override
128    public void handleEvent(StreamWindowEvent<Tuple> event) throws Exception {
129
130        AggregateInfo state = getPartitionState(event.getPartition());
131
132        switch (event.getType()) {
133        
134        case INITIAL_FULL:
135            /**
136             * Nothing to do, StatefulWindowListener provides a utility method
137             * to track if the INITIAL_FULL has occurred on a per-partition
138             * basis.
139             */
140            break;
141
142        case INSERTION:
143            /*
144             * On insertion update the sum and count with each tuple being
145             * inserted by adding its attribute's value to the sum.
146             */
147            for (Tuple tuple : event.getTuples()) {
148                state.sum = state.sum.add(tuple.getBigDecimal(attributeName),
149                        mc);
150                state.count++;
151            }
152            break;
153
154        case EVICTION:
155            if (getWindow().getType() == StreamWindow.Type.TUMBLING) {
156                // No need to maintain the state incrementally,
157                // each tumble will allocate a new state via
158                // getInitializedState().
159                // Just submit the aggregation.
160                submitAggregateOutput(state);
161                break;
162            }
163            
164            /*
165             * Sliding window only.
166             * On eviction update the sum and count with each tuple being
167             * removed by subtracting its attribute's value from the sum.
168             */
169            for (Tuple tuple : event.getTuples()) {
170                if (mc != null)
171                    state.sum = state.sum.subtract(tuple
172                            .getBigDecimal(attributeName), mc);
173                state.count--;
174            }
175            break;
176
177        case TRIGGER:
178            // Only trigger once a full window has been seen.
179            if (!seenInitialFull(event.getPartition()))
180                break;
181            
182            /**
183             * Submit the aggregation to the output port.
184             */
185            submitAggregateOutput(state);
186            break;
187            
188        case FINAL:
189            /**
190             * Submit the partial aggregation if any tuples
191             * remain in the window at final marker time.
192             */
193            submitAggregateOutput(state);
194            outputPort.punctuate(StreamingData.Punctuation.FINAL_MARKER);
195            break;
196        }
197    }
198    
199    /**
200     * Submit the aggregate tuple for this partition.
201     * @param state State for a partition.
202     * @throws Exception Exception submitting information.
203     */
204    protected void submitAggregateOutput(AggregateInfo state) throws Exception {
205        
206        // Only submit output if the window contains tuples.
207        if (state.count == 0)
208            return;
209        
210        OutputTuple tuple = outputPort.newTuple();
211        setupOutputTuple(tuple, state);
212        
213        outputPort.submit(tuple);
214        outputPort.punctuate(StreamingData.Punctuation.WINDOW_MARKER);
215    }
216    
217    /**
218     * Set attributes in the tuple representing the aggregation.
219     * Sets the <code>sum</code> and <code>count</code> fields.
220     * @param tuple Tuple that will be submitted.
221     * @param state Partitioned aggregation state.
222     */
223    protected void setupOutputTuple(OutputTuple tuple, AggregateInfo state) {
224        tuple.setBigDecimal("sum", state.sum);
225        tuple.setInt("count", state.count);        
226    }
227}
